products.title: Splash Beige - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: The splash beige light filtering skylight blind is a light, natural looking colour for your skylight window. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Putty - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Vitra Blackout Beige Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: Vitra blackout is one of their most popular blackout fabrics. In several fresh, bright shades, this fabric is a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. This option comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework. This blackout fabric has a colour match backing and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction. Product id: db-srb0008 fabric colour: beige material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes vitra blackout beige velux keylite fakro dakstra in cream.

products.title: Sprinkle Solar Hemp Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: A fun geometric-design, sprinkle solar comes in several shades. Perfect for adding modern splashes of colour to your home. Featuring an aluminium coated back, this fabric reflects heat in summer and retains heat in summer. A perfect thermal fabric. Product id: db-pls0139 fabric colour: hemp material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Jasmine Solar Ice Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: A solar control fabric in four shades to both compliment your dcor and provide solar protection. Product id: db-pls0120 fabric colour: ice material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric. products.title: Infusion Solar Beige Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. The infusion solar beige pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0008 fabric colour: beige headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.description: Calia solar comes in several neutral shades. products.title: Roller, 1086 Beige - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.
